application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T0696 Silver Birch - Lateral prune to clear building by approx 2-3m to prevent damage to building, crown lift to 4m for vehicle clearance. No change to overall height and spread. T0550 Cotoneaster - Crown Reduce by 2-3m, close to wall, widespread crown encroaching window and sign. Current spread 6m, leaving finished spread of 3-4m, currently height 6m, leaving a finished height of 3-4m.T0549 Prunus - Crown Reduce by 2-3m, Crown close to building. Current spread 6m, leaving finished spread of 3-4m, currently height 6m, leaving a finished height of 3-4m.T0697 Cherry - Pollard at 2m. Current height 4m and spread 4m, therefore reducing height and spread by approx 2m.
